overview_of_class: The course is designed to be an introduction to molecular and cell biology. Students will gain an understanding of important topics in molecular biology and cell biology: the central dogma, the replication and decoding of genetic information, regulation of gene expression, organelle structure and function, cytoskeletal dynamics, cell cycle and cell division. In addition students will learn to read primary scientific literature.
name: Molecular and Cell Biology for ISP
title: WCAS BIOL_SCI 240-0-1 Molecular and Cell Biology for ISP

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The course is designed to be an introduction to molecular and cell biology. Students will gain an understanding of important topics in molecular biology and cell biology: the central dogma, the replication and decoding of genetic information, regulation of gene expression, organelle structure and function, cytoskeletal dynamics, cell cycle and cell division. In addition students will learn to read primary scientific literature.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Must be enrolled in the Integrated Sciences Program.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Essential Cell Biology, 4th Edition, 2014, Alberts et al., Garland Science ISBN 978-0-8153-4454-4 hardcover cost from $46.64

subject: BIOL_SCI
